timeline.body: We should probably only fire this event once. Instead, we could store the values into fields annotated with Unique, and then access them from the ModifyVariable locations.

```suggestion
 * Occurs when a player falls, but is able to fly.
 * {@link net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingFallEvent} will be fired for players that are not able to fly.
```
